title: Harapeko na Joushi no I wo Tsukamu Houhou: Sasen-saki wa Kyuutei Majutsushi no Senzoku Chef
original_name: 腹ぺこな上司の胃をつかむ方法 ～左遷先は宮廷魔導師〈まじゅつし〉の専属シェフ～
sinopse:
With a sudden job transfer, Wilfred is thrown into a certain division filled with weirdos! There, he meets Ester, his boss who has nothing to do but eat. Wilfred originally intended to hone and master magic, but he finds himself thrown into the duty of being her exclusive chef?!

(Source: Kadokawa, translated)
